content.rendered:
To support a sharp increase in production at the Cerro Verde copper mine, Terre Armée built 33.80 metre high walls for two primary crushers to facilitate dumper traffic.

A total of 4,400 sq. metres of Reinforced Earth® walls were erected using GeoStrap® reinforcements. Terre Armée also provided technical support and supplied the materials.

excerpt.rendered: Some 4,400 sq. metres of Reinforced Earth® walls with a height of more than 30 metres were built at the Cerro Verde copper mining site.
